person.persName: John L. Alverson (Jessamine County, Kentucky, wagonmaker.)

body.p: Jessamine County, Kentucky, wagonmaker. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Clark Alverson in Madison County, Kentucky, on May 16, 1861. Father of William Alverson and John Alverson. Wagonmaker in Jessamine County, Kentucky, in 1860. Wagonmaker in Jessamine County in 1863.
